title: 药水效果简单翻译
author: green丶bastard
txt_content:
本帖最后由 green丶bastard 于 2011-10-8 14:26 编辑 

ID Name (in source code)
名字（java里的代码）
 Effect
效果
 Strength
威力
 How it's acquired
影响啥
 Alchemical ingredient
方案
 Notes 1 

 Speed  速度(potion.moveSpeed) Expands FOV and increases walking speed 增加视野，提升移动速度 Increases both effects, stronger levels turn the FOV upside down and reverse controls
增加视野和移动速度，太厉害的药会让屏幕电脑控制方向混乱（泡泡堂里吃了魔王那种效果）
 Sprinting and Flying
跑步和飞行
 Sugar or Sugar and Glowstone Dust
糖或者糖和萤石粉

 2 

 Slowness 减速(potion.moveSlowdown) Contracts FOV and decreases walking speed
与上面相反
 Increases both effects, reversing controls if very strong
与上面相反但厉害的也会倒置屏幕等
 Charging a Bow
弓箭蓄力
 Sugar and Fermented Spider Eye or Magma Cream and Fermented Spider Eye
糖和发酵蜘蛛眼
黏糊糕和发酵蜘蛛眼


 3 

 Haste  加速度(potion.digSpeed) Arm swings faster, blocks break faster
手臂挥舞更快，破坏方块时间减少
 Increases both effects, arm motion appears to stop if very strong
若挥舞太快手臂貌似会停止那动作



 4 

 Mining Fatigue 减速度(potion.digSlowDown) Arm swings slower, blocks break slower, however it is still possible to break blocks just as fast with insta-break on
上面相反
 Increases both effects




 5 

 Strength 力量(potion.damageBoost) Increases damage dealt with fists
增加赤手时的攻击


 Blaze Powder
热炎粉

 6 

 Instant Health 瞬间恢复(potion.heal) Instant health gain
快速的恢复血
 Sets the amount gained 
加血

 Ghast Tear
地狱水母眼泪

 7 

 Instant Damage (potion.harm) 瞬间伤害
 Instant health loss
上面相反
 Sets the amount lost
上面相反

 Spider Eye and Fermented Spider Eye
蜘蛛眼和发酵蜘蛛眼
 Death reason is reported as "was killed by magic".
smp中显示的死亡原因是“被魔法杀死” 简单点就是走火入魔
 8 

 Jump Boost (potion.jump) [1.9pre2] Allows the player to jump higher.
1.9 pre2： 跳跃更高
 Changes the jump height 更换跳跃高度



 9 

 Nausea (potion.confusion) Causes the view to wobble similarly to using a portal
让视野变得像进了地狱门一样 就是那紫色的一圈一圈
 No apparent effect
无效果



 10 

 Regeneration (potion.regeneration)
积攒体力
 Causes health to regenerate over time
时间久了积攒体力
 Makes health regenerate faster
积攒体力更快
 Eat a Golden Apple
吃了金苹果


 11 

 Resistance (potion.resistance)
防御
 No apparent effect
无效果（代码没写完啊= =）




 12 

 Fire Resistance 耐火(potion.fireResistance) [1.9pre2] Makes the player resistant to fire and lava.
1.9pre2 让玩家不怕火


 Magma Cream
黏糊糕

 13 

 Water Breathing 水下呼吸(potion.waterBreathing) Causes air meter to be constantly full while underwater
水下持久呼吸
 No apparent effect
暂无效果



 14 

 Invisibility 隐身(potion.invisibility) No apparent effect
暂时无效 （smp这东西好玩啊）




 15 

 Blindness 失明(potion.blindness) [1.9pre2] Creates thick black fog around the player Screenshot
1.9pre2 让玩家屏幕充满黑雾
 No apparent effect
暂无效果



 16 

 Night Vision  夜视(potion.nightVision) No apparent effect
暂无效果




 17 

 Hunger (potion.hunger)
饥饿
 Causes food meter to deplete faster
让饥饿条下降迅猛（蛋疼）
 Increases the depletion rate
更快饥饿
 Chance on eating Raw Chicken or Rotten Flesh.
吃了生鸡肉或者僵尸肉有几率产生


 18 

 Weakness  软弱（阳你懂）(potion.weakness) [1.9pre2] Lowers the player's attack power.
攻击减少
 Decreases your reach.
增加抓程（就是能把方块放的更远 不会翻）

 Fermented Spider Eye
发酵蜘蛛眼

 19 

 Poison (potion.poison)
中毒
 Deals damage over time持续伤害 Increases the damage rate
增加攻击
 Given by a Cave Spider's attack or eating a Spider Eye.
被洞窟蜘蛛攻击了或者吃了蜘蛛眼
 Spider Eye
蜘蛛眼

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 蛋疼 小图标居然显示异常了 来自维基： http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Potion_effects

replies.author: wind0301
replies.txt_content:
唉..
1.9pre3比1.9pre2更少藥水 OTL (我在pre2玩mod才有藥水 -w-

replies.author: HQT
replies.txt_content: 不错！  还有我的头像换了怎么还是旧的头像阿...

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 我这里看头像更新了 ls的去清理缓存吧- -

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 同玩1.8 所以翻译有误也请谅解- -

replies.author: a919298641
replies.txt_content:
john180 发表于 2011-10-8 17:19 
表示不玩1.9现在在玩1.8
表示现在一直玩1.7......
